title: Can you refund my "Box of Tickets"?
body:
Hi.
2 Days ago to shop came "Box of Tickets". I found it in "Hextech Crafting" bookmark.
 The description is IMO is misleading
---> https://imgur.com/a/3sYSZ
 
I actually was not sure what this will be, because when I found that in client was zero information about that whole "EU Beta Tournament". But the description said, that this is something for Hextech Crafting.
 
After purchase  I didn't get anything to craft ఠ_ఠ
 
I don't need that tickets. Better for me is to use that ~2k BE for gifting 2 Christmas icons, or something else...

1) Can you take that tickets from by account & give me back my 1950 BE?
2) Can you change that description to something like "Everything you need to join EU Beta Tournament", or something similar?

replies.body: Heya, we don't have a lot of info on Clash while it's still being tested in regions we don't have a lot of visibility on.  You may want to ask about this in the[ Clash Discord](https://discord.gg/league-clash-beta), but also reach out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  A specialist should be able to take a look into this for you and find some options.  See you there!
